com.ea.orbit.rest.async

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ea.orbit.rest.async.RestClient

  • public class RestClient
extends Object
    Utility class to create proxies for JAX-RS client interfaces.

    This class is thread safe and immutable.

    Author:
    Daniel Sperry

      • get

        public <T> T get(Class<T> interfaceClass)
        Returns an implementation of a jax-rs interface.

        The methods will issue remote calls to the web target provided on the OrbitRestClient constructor.

        The there are other implementation of rest proxies. The special benefit of OrbitRestClient is that the interface method can return CompletableFuture or Task If that is the case, those methods will return immediately and the Future will be completed asynchronously.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The interface type
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - the jax-rs annotated interface class
        Returns:
        an implementation of the interface that will make remote rest calls

      • reThrow

        protected static <TThrowable extends Throwable,TResult> TResult reThrow(Throwable throwable)
                                                                 throws TThrowable extends Throwable
        Allows Rest Clients to filter exceptions that may arises from invoked calls.
        Type Parameters:
        TThrowable - The Throwable type that will be returned
        TResult - The actual type returned
        Parameters:
        throwable - The exception that was encountered
        Returns:
        The filtered exception
        Throws:
        TThrowable
        TThrowable extends Throwable

        public <T extends RestClient> T property(String propertyName,
                                         Object propertyValue)
        Builds a new Rest Client with a WebTarget that applies the specified property.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
